Package com.hedera.hashgraph.identity.hcs.vc

Class HcsVcTransaction

java.lang.Object
com.hedera.hashgraph.identity.hcs.MessageTransaction<HcsVcMessage>
com.hedera.hashgraph.identity.hcs.vc.HcsVcTransaction
public class HcsVcTransaction
extends MessageTransaction<HcsVcMessage>
The DID document creation, update or deletion transaction. Builds a correct HcsDidMessage and send it to HCS DID topic.

      public HcsVcTransaction​(com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.TopicId topicId, HcsVcOperation operation, java.lang.String credentialHash, com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.PublicKey signerPublicKey)
      Instantiates a new transaction object.
      Parameters:
      topicId - The HCS VC topic ID where message will be submitted.
      operation - The operation to be performed on a verifiable credential.
      credentialHash - The hash of a credential.
      signerPublicKey - Public key of the signer of this operation.
